SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Socialchannelstype] ( [Socialchannelstype_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [Socialchannelstype_Titolo] varchar(100) NULL , [Socialchannelstype_Icona] varchar(100) NULL , [Socialchannelstype_Attivo] bit NULL , [Socialchannelstype_UserInsert] int NULL , [Socialchannelstype_UserUpdate] int NULL , [Socialchannelstype_UserDelete] int NULL , [Socialchannelstype_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [Socialchannelstype_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [Socialchannelstype_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Socialchannelstype] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_Socialchannelstype PRIMARY KEY ([Socialchannelstype_Ky])
